meanings.definition: To cook (food) by dousing in alcohol and setting alight.
meanings.sent1: The chef will flambee the dessert at the table.
meanings.sent2: She flambees the bananas to create a delicious treat.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen was filled with excitement as they flambeed the dish.
meanings.sent4: The flames danced gracefully as the chef flambeed the steak.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the flambeed dish lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: A dish that is cooked in this way.
meanings.sent1: The flambee was the highlight of the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: He ordered the flambee for dessert to enjoy the fiery presentation.
meanings.sent3: The flambee on the menu always attracts curious diners.
meanings.sent4: The dessert looked like a flambee masterpiece on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The flambee dessert was a showstopper with its flaming presentation.
